result.eng: Have you ever seen such a thing?
result.ga: An bhfaca tú riamh a leithéid
result.orig: An bhfaca tú riamh a leithéid
result.html: An bhfaca tú riamh a leithéidHave you ever seen such a thing?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfaca tú riaṁ a leiṫéidHave you ever seen such a thing?

result.eng: Have you ever been to Paris?
result.ga: An raibh tú riamh i bPáras
result.orig: An raibh tú riamh i bPáras
result.html: An raibh tú riamh i bPárasHave you ever been to Paris?
result.ponchtml: An raiḃ tú riaṁ i bPárasHave you ever been to Paris?

result.eng: I hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.
result.ga: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arís
result.orig: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arís
result.html: Tá súil agam nach mbeidh orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arísI hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.
result.ponchtml: Tá súil agam naċ mbeiḋ orm plé leis na daoine sin go deo arísI hope I won't have to deal with those people ever again.

result.eng: Have you ever been to Carna?
result.ga: An raibh tú riamh i gCarna
result.orig: An raibh tú riamh i gCarna
result.html: An raibh tú riamh i gCarnaHave you ever been to Carna?
result.ponchtml: An raiḃ tú riaṁ i gCarnaHave you ever been to Carna?

result.eng: I go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?
result.ga: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadh
result.orig: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadh
result.html: Téim ag snámh sa bhfarraige chuile lá den bhliain Fiú sa gheimhreadhI go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?
result.ponchtml: Téim ag snáṁ sa ḃfarraige ċuile lá den ḃliain Fiú sa ġeiṁreaḋI go swimming in the sea ever day of the year. Even in the winter?

result.eng: Everybody who ever died in this house.
result.ga: Iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamh
result.orig: Iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamh
result.html: Iomlán a bhfuair bás sa teach seo riamhEverybody who ever died in this house.
result.ponchtml: Iomlán a ḃfuair bás sa teaċ seo riaṁEverybody who ever died in this house.

result.eng: Don't ever fall in love with a woman.
result.ga: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoi
result.orig: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoi
result.html: Ná thabhair grá do chroí choíche do mhnaoiDon't ever fall in love with a woman.
result.ponchtml: Ná ṫaḃair grá do ċroí ċoíċe do ṁnaoiDon't ever fall in love with a woman.
